meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Reese Wallace Christine O'Donnell Kyle Jones Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7821.

td.p: Reese Wallace, an editor from Orlando, Florida
Christine O'Donnell, a philanthropic advisor from Elmwood Park, New Jersey
Kyle Jones, a music teacher from Aurora, Colorado (whose 3-day cash winnings total $58,800)

tr.td: LETTUCE BEGIN
A BIT O' BRIT LIT
SHOW BOATS
(Alex: We'll give you the boat. You tell us the show.)
COMPAN"EE"S
REGIONAL VOCABULARY
STATE SONGS
(Alex: And we want you, of course, to identify the state.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
